relevant_findings.general: Alert, oriented x3, no acute distress
relevant_findings.heent: Normocephalic, atraumatic, extraocular movements intact, pupils equal, round, reactive to light and accommodation, no scleral icterus, mucosa moist, no lymphadenopathy
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, S1 and S2 present, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops, carotids 2+, no bruits or jugular venous distention
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no crackles or rhonchi
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, no guarding, rebound, or frank peritonitis, bowel sounds present in all four quadrants, mildly tender to palpation over incisions
relevant_findings.incision_wounds: Clean, dry, intact, no hematoma or ecchymosis
relevant_findings.extremities: No cyanosis, clubbing, or edema; feet warm with good perfusion
relevant_findings.neurological: Reflexes, strength, and sensation grossly intact; cranial nerves II-XII within normal limits
